title: Hour 1: This Tua Shall Pass
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Damien Woody, and Dan Orlovsky preview the upcoming weekend of NFL games and debate who will come out on top in the matchup between Cooper Rush and Matt Stafford. Plus, Lamar Jackson and Joe Burrow have both led their teams to 2-2 starts, but which young QB would we rather build a team around? Stephen A. and Dan can't agree on this one. And, we have more updates and reaction on Miami's handling of Tua Tagovailoa's injury.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: How is Mike McDaniel reacting to criticism of Miami's handling of Tua's injury?
